title: Who is excited about the API going public?

comments.author: multivira.7925
comments.body:
zeeZ.5713:
Killer Rhino.6794:

I think the OP is reacting to an article on PCGamerN.

Talk about a misleading title

Indeed, that explains some things I’ve been reading that made me scratch my head.

comments.author: zeeZ.5713
comments.body:
Killer Rhino.6794:

I think the OP is reacting to an article on PCGamerN.

Talk about a misleading title

comments.author: prenavo.3926
comments.body: Wow, and I thought it was news. LOL. I read that on three different gaming sites and all within the last 24 hours. Anyway, I think it’s amazing. hehe.

comments.author: smiley.1438
comments.body:
btw. there are some stickied threads on the top of this forum:

API implementation library master list
List of apps and websites using the API

;)

comments.author: Killer Rhino.6794
comments.body: I think the OP is reacting to an article on PCGamerN. That’s fine, the more aware people are that this possibility exists, the better support the APIs will get, and the more opportunities we, as developers, will have.

comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body: Uh… you’re over a month late to the party, there’s already a ton of sites and apps using the API.

comments.author: prenavo.3926
comments.body: Just what the title says. I’m looking forward to seeing some apps and maps.
